summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Law Department; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1983 Budget of the Judgment and Claims Fund (Fund 126) to provide for costs of litigation, including retention of special counsel, in defense of the City and certain City officers in various lawsuits involving Washington Public Power Supply System Plants 1 through 5 and providing payment therefor from the Light Fund; and waiving the full application of SMC 20.46.
